revised_title: Alfred Russel Wallace and His Contributions to the Theory of Evolution
tldr: This article discusses the life and work of Alfred Russel Wallace, who independently discovered the principle of natural selection alongside Charles Darwin. It highlights Wallace's background, his experiences in the Amazon and Malay archipelago, and his unique approach to understanding evolution. Despite their different backgrounds and personalities, both Wallace and Darwin reached similar conclusions about the theory of evolution, leading to a significant impact on the scientific community.
